choices.text: Oak Sapling - Well known simple early game!
Bamboo - Similar easy but different early-game!

treeConfirm.text: You will start with a Oak Sapling on a dirt block. This is the default mode and if you've already played SkyBlock you should know how to progress.

choices.text: Confirm (Chose your Origin in the next step - Suitable Origins: any except the Merling)

bambooConfirm.text: You will start on a block of podzol with a planted bamboo on it. This mode is very Similar to Simple Tree, you just have to craft wood from bambo.

choices.text: Confirm (Chose your Origin in the next step - Suitable Origins: any except the Merling)

fishingConfirm.text: You will start in 2 blocks of hollow Logs filled with water. Equiped with a fishing rod, you have to hope for luck. Getting a sapling and a soil block to continue is your first goal.

choices.text: Confirm (Chose your Origin in the next step - Suitable Origins: any)
